revised_title: Gem Mining and Geology of the Ruby District in Upper Burma
tldr: This article discusses the geology and gem mining techniques in the ruby district of Upper Burma. The author describes the various types of rocks found in the area, including gneissic, granulitic, and basic rocks, which contain the rubies and spinels. The mining methods, such as hill-wash, alluvial deposits, and cave mining, are also explained. The author highlights the similarities and differences between the geology of Upper Burma and other gem-yielding regions.
